record.title: Help not found
record.description:
A user define exception has been occurred and you can find solution from following sources.

Check appRain manual

You can find solution in appRain manual. Please browse www.apprain.org/manual Or view videos from www.apprain.org/videos

Create Ticket

Create a ticket to get reply from appRain developer. Please browse www.apprain.org/ticket

Contact via Email

You can communicate thought email to get help. Send email at info@apprain.com

record.title: Page Name
record.shortdesc: An unique identifier of a page.
record.description:
Page Name is an identifier of a Page that used to retrieve, update and to generate Page URL.

Note: Please avoid special characters in page name, Use only alpha-numeric format. For example: HomePage, customer-profile.

record.title: Select Page
record.shortdesc: Select a page to edit content.
record.description:
Drop Down contains all available pages name. Please select a name and load content to view and edit.

Note: Save your page before navigate to other page.

record.title: Select Snip
record.shortdesc: Select a Snip to edit Source Code.
record.description:
Please select a Snip and load source to view and edit PHP, HTML, JavaScript and Others.

Note: Save your page before navigate to other page.

record.title: Snip Name
record.shortdesc: A unique identifier of PHP script.
record.description:
A "Snip Name" is unique identifier that use to execute it.

Note: Only Alpha numeric characters, dash(-) and underscore(_) is used to generate a page name. For example: sample-php.

record.title: Snip Content
record.description:
Snip contents PHP source code. This PHP code execute by importing in Static Page.

All PHP resource and Object can call in a snip with help of App factory, for example:

 App::Model('Member')->findAll();

record.title: Content Placeholder
record.description:
You can select one or more Placeholder to render page content.

Use CTRL+Left Click or SHIFT+Left Click to select place holder.

You can see all hidden place by following setting

Preference > Configuration > Show Hook Positions

record.title: Render Type
record.shortdesc: Define the format of the content in Placeholder.
record.description:
You can place a content as Link, Smart Link or Text.

Means..

Link creates a Hyper Link of the page. In Link mode the url format is like 

www.example.com/page/view/about-us

Smart Link similar to Link but link format is like

www.example.com/about-us

note: If smart link format match with a URL customized by URI Manager that then page content can overwrite.

Text mode render full page content in the Placeholder.

record.title: Page Meta Title
record.shortdesc: Render in title of the page.
record.description: This content renders in title tag of the page. We can see this text in the title bar of the browser.

record.title: Meta Keyword
record.description: This value render in Meta Keyword tag of the page. You can find it in HTML code or Page Properties.

record.title: Meta Description
record.description: This value render in Meta Description tag of the page. You can find it in HTML code or Page Properties.

record.title: Rich Rext Editor mode
record.description: You can enable/disable WYSIWYG editor of a page.

record.title: Quick Navigation
record.description:
Quick Navigation shows you all accessible inner links of admin panel. This page load when you login or click on Home Button on Left Top of window.

The Home Button load User Account page if quick navigation page is already loaded.

record.title: Activity Widget
record.shortdesc: System Quick Information and Cache status
record.description:
Activity Widget provide a quick overview of system and Cache Status.

You can enable/disable this feature from:

Preference > Site Options > Activity Widget

record.title: Leave a Message
record.description:
Leave a Message is a simple way to communicate between administrator. Start typing email address in the box to see auto hints.

You can enable/disable this feature from:

Preference > Site Options > Leave a Message

record.title: ACL (Access Control Limit)
record.shortdesc: Manage user access level in diffirent section.
record.description:
ACL helps to manage user access level in admin panel. Super Admin has full access in admin panel and it does not have options to customized access.

For general Admin system creates a tree of access area and check box to assign right. ACL section also shows custom access options.

record.title: Personal Information
record.description:
Personal Information section gives you access to update Profile and Password.

Profile is user's general information related to address and profession.

Password is admin login credential, you are requested to use a complex phase which is not guessable. Default rule of password is

  • Length at least 8 characters.
  • At least one Numeric character.
  • At least one Upper Case Character
  • At least one Lower Case Character

record.title: Personal Information
record.description: Personal Information section gives you access to update member's Profile.

record.title: Other Information
record.description:
Other Information section gives you access to update member's Password, Address and Note.

Note: In update window, by default password fields are locked, enable the field by check the "Checkbox" before edit password.

record.title: Components
record.shortdesc: Components are pluggable module to enhance your project to be Easy and Quicker.
record.description:
Each row in the list show installed components with name and a brief description.

Install New components:
Click on "Install New Compoent" button to see the component upload area. Select source in ZIP and again click "Install" button to install it. After installtion you can see the new component in the list. Now activate it to use.

Component Options:
Most of the component creates options on left side of Component Window or Main Bar. The component functions always depends to the developer.

FTP Access:
In some server folders are restrict to write. To ensure a smooth installation, enter FTP access to get installer permission to upload files in right place.
Click on "Save FTP Information(Recommandad)" to enter ftp access.

record.title: Component Actions Bar
record.shortdesc: Helps you to Activate, Deactivate and Remove a Component.
record.description:
Use following buttons to manage component

ACTIVATE:
If you see red ACTIVATE link means the component is not installed. Click on that to install the component

DEACTIVATE
If you see Green DEACTIVATE link means the component is already installed. Click on the link to deactivate it.

HELP
Click on HELP link to see a quick help.

REMOVE
REMOVE option delete the component from system with Source Files.

record.title: Debug Mode
record.shortdesc: System Debug Mode to Display Report.
record.description:
Debug Mode helps to see system debug reports in three mode.

Value definitions
0: Disable System warning and Message, On this mode system disable all additional SQL statements
1: Enable System warning and Message
2: Shows executed SQL at the bottom of the page and enable system message.

record.title: Inline Help
record.description:
Enable/Disable appRain inline help. Manage (?) marked links in admin panel.
Enabled: Display inline help link.
Disabled: Remove all inline help link.

record.title: Error Report Mode
record.description:
Error Report Mode define system message storing process.
Save error report in Cache folder.
Email error report to support email address.
None disable error reporting.

record.title: Show Hook Positions
record.description:
Helps to see Place Holders positions in Website template. Placeholders are use in Page Manager to place content.

How to Check Hook Position
Set "Show Hook Positions" value â€œYes" then go website frontend and refresh the page. Each Placeholder will view in a red square box with keyword. Set "No" to hide all position flags.

record.title: Model Cache
record.description:
Model is a connection class for database table. If Model Cache is set to "Yes" then system creates a File Cache for each model.

Use Model cache to make the database access faster.

record.title: Addon Cache
record.description:
Addons are used to install JavaScript, CSS base plugin. Each addon has an XML Definition file. On each page load system parse selected Definitions.

"Yes" => Enable Addon Cache
"No" => Disable Addon Cache

record.title: Profile User Cache
record.shortdesc: Cache Profile default Settings and Pages.
record.description: This features is not available in 3.0.1 and on newer versions

record.title: URI Manager Cache
record.description:
URI Manager helps to create user friendly URL in website. All Rewrite rules are saved in XML definition in following location: 

/development/definition/uri_manager

This option enables to create temporary cache of definition to make the system faster.

Set "Yes" to enable "URI Manager Cache".

record.title: Site Setting Cache
record.shortdesc: Create Cache for Site Setting Definitions
record.description:
Site Setting Section maintains mapping between Database and XML definition files and manage Website Common Setting Values.

Set "Yes" to enable cache for definition files.

record.title: Interface Builder Cache
record.shortdesc: Create Cache for Admin Panel structure Definitions.
record.description:
Interface Builder Manage the Admin Panel structure and Access Control based on XML definition.

Set "Yes" to enable Interface Builder Cache.

record.title: CategorySet Cache
record.description:
CategorySet is to manage Recursive Categories based on XML definition.

Set "Yes" to enable CategorySet Cache.

record.title: InformationSet Cache
record.description:
InformationSet is with all field definition saved in XML definition and creates data process window automatically.

Set "Yes" to enable InformationSet Cache.

record.title: Language Cache
record.description:
All language definition saved in XML format.

Set "Yes" to enable Language Cache.

record.title: Search Cache
record.description:
Serach module can cache search result to produce faster output.

Set "Yes" to enable Search Cache.

record.title: Load Model Access
record.description:
Generally we use App factory to call a model like

App::Model('ModelName')

This setting is set to "Yes" then Model can access like $this->ModelName

This method is not recommanded

record.title: URI Mask
record.description:
URI Mask is used to make the website address user friendly. In MVC pattern the URL is always generate based on Action Method name of controller and can not use special character like Hypen(-), Colon(:), Dot(.) in function name. The URI Mask is used to replace special character in underscore('_').

For example, If URI Mask is set to hypen(-) and an URL is generate like www.example.com/home/search-result then action method can write like bellow:

public function search_result(){

}

record.title: Admin Phase Saperator
record.shortdesc: Saperator used in Admin Panel Page Title.
record.description: This saperator is used in Admin Panel Title to saperate the Section and Action Phase.

record.title: URL Saperator Mask
record.shortdesc: Replace the URL Saperator to mask it.
record.description:
By default / as a URL separator. But we can change mask it by other character.

For example if URL Saperator Mask is set to '$' then bellow two link will act similer 

www.example.com/home/search
www.example.com/home$search

record.title: Session Time Out
record.shortdesc: Set maximum session time out limit.
record.description: Session Time Out overwrite default session timeout time. The value consider in Munite.

record.title: Cookie Time Out
record.shortdesc: Set maximum cookie time out limit.
record.description: Cookie Time Out overwrite default duration of timeout. The value consider in Munite.

record.title: CategorySet Path Mode
record.description:
CategoryPath tree view has two methods. Path 1
Display Category link with "|_" to view the relation with parents.

Path 2
Display full part tree in single link like "Parent A > Parent B > Child".

record.description:
Enter relative path to show when page not found. By default it set to Home Page(/). You can set other page like bellow 

/page/view/pagenotfound
This setting will redirect user in www.example.com//page/view/pagenotfound.

This setting work when Debug mode is set to "0"

record.title: Error Color Code

record.title: Success Color Code
record.description: Set background color for success input field. It specially used in Validation Addon.

record.title: Text for previous button
record.description: This text is used for previous button. It is considered for Model, CategorySet and InformationSet

record.title: Text for next button
record.description: This text is used for next button. It is considered for Model, CategorySet and InformationSet

record.title: Global Router
record.shortdesc: Fix the webiste in a page.
record.description:
Global router fix user in a particuler page of the webiste. The location is set in Global Router setting in following location

/development/definition/uri_manager/global_router.xml

record.title: View Admin Info
record.description: Show admin name and date of Administrator who has update data of InformationSet and Category data view window.

record.title: JavaScript Validation
record.description: Enable JavaScript validation in all InformationSet data process interface.

record.title: Admin Information
record.description: Show admin information who recently updated InformationSet and CategorySet data.

record.title: Deleted Data
record.description:
Store deleted data in system in serialized format. Deleted data can view from: 

Preference > Cache and Log > Log In Batabase

record.title: Data Store duration
record.description: System clear deleted data after this period. Enter value in Days.

record.title: File Extension
record.description: Enter file extension to restrict during upload in File Manager.

record.title: Site Setting
record.description:
Site Settings are common setting that help to configure sites. Site Setting can "Admin Setting", "Site Options", "Theme" or any other setting create by developer.

This is a convient way to create option for User to give option to webiste customization.

Developer Access

Site Setting are available around the website in variable. All fields are saved in XML. Generally all XML definition files are stored in following location:
development/definition/site_settings.
It also may found with Themes and Components.

You can retrive value by useing follwoing APIs
App::Config()->siteInfo([fieldname])
App::Config()->setting([fieldname]).
For example: App::Config()->setting('site_title');

record.title: Website Theme
record.description:
"Current Theme" shows the theme information is currenty installed.

"Theme Collection" is theme gallery to install, Click "Install" to activate it and "Remove" to delete the theme from system.

record.title: Export Database
record.description: Export the full database in *.SQL format. Data can restore by using the exported file.

record.title: Importt Database
record.description: Database can restore by using it. This field support *.SQL

record.title: MVC Manager
record.description: This section shows status of Model, View, Controllers, Installers etc.

record.title: Language Manager
record.description:
Language manager helps to get multiple language support.

Each entry has a Language Code and Value. Language code is use in language function to show Language value. Use follwing function to use the code
$this->__('[LANGUAGE_CODE]');
For example: echo $this->__('[HOME]');

record.title: Temporary Cache Manager
record.description:
System creates several caches to ensure faster process. We use Cache Manager to clear all temporary cache if need.

Select all or a particular type of cache and click "Flush Cache" button to clear it.

NB. After updating any configuration xml you may refresh the cache to make it active also you can disable cache from configuration section. 

Preference > System > Configuration

record.title: Page Not found
record.description:
The requested page not found becuase action method has not created. You can solve the issue by applying any of follwing methods:

1. Create an Action Method

Action Method is a function inside the action controler class. Find the Action Controller in following location or inside in related component. This name of the file is same as you used in the URL like {arg0}.php. 
/development/controllers/{arg0}.php
An Action method looks like bellow example. The method name must have a post fix "Action" for example {arg1}Action 
public function {arg1}Action(){
	
}

2. Rout Page path

Your can edit router setting to load other page in this URL. Router configuration is available in following location. 
 /development/definition/uri_manager/page_router.xml
Create a new role and set Actual and Virtual path. Like follwing example 
{lt}role{gt}
  {lt}ractual{gt}{arg0}/{arg1}{lt}actual{gt}
  {lt}rvirtual{gt}my_new_page_path{lt}/virtual{gt}
{lt}/role{gt}

2. Enable 404 setting

You can enable 404 page setting and set the new location of this page. It will help you to handle all broken page.

First login to admin panel and set the 404 page path in follwing location 
Preference/Configuration/404 Page
Enter "/" to redirect in home page.

In same configuration page set the "Debug mode" 0(Zero) in following location 
Preference/Configuration/Debug Mode

record.title: Page Not found
Model Not found
Class not found
record.description:
The requested class {arg0} not found in the system. You can apply follwing method to solve the issue

Create New a Class

You can load a class automatically if you follow the naming conversion. Create the class name by joinging the folder path of a class. Consider the path from root directory of your project. For example, If the class name "{arg0}" and path is 
/development/myclasses/{arg1}
This class name should be 
class Development_Myclasses_{arg0}{
	
}

Load a Class

It is always recommand, not to load a class by useing new key if it's not badly neaded. Use follwing way to load the class 
${arg0}Obj = App::__obj('Development_Myclasses_{arg0}');
This method will save memory by applying Singleton Design Pattern.

Recommand Class Location

There are several standard place for a class in the system.
Create a Helper
Helper is a best place if you are creating a new class from basic. You can access it easily even if you create it inside your component. Helper path is 
/development/helper
If your helper name is {arg0} the create a file like bellow 
/development/helper/{arg1}.php
Now, Load a helper like bellow 
// Example 1
App::Helper({arg0})

// Example 2
App::Helper({arg0})->calculateGrossSalary();
Create a Plugin
Plugin is generally used for 3rd party class. Plugin is almost like Helper but it has an extra facilty, you can load a class that you dont like to rename. Plugin path 
/development/plugin
You can load a plugin like bellow 
// Example 1
App::Plugin({arg0})

// Example 2
App::Plugin({arg0})->calculateGrossSalary();

Enable Magic Method Access in the Class

Always extend you class or end chain of the class to appRain_Base_Objects

This class attach Matic method and database Abstraction. You can Set and Get a value and jump diffirent thread. For example 
 /* ----------- Set Value --------------- */
// Set multipe value
${arg0}Obj->setFirstName('Jhon')
  ->setLastName('Regan');
  
// Set single value   
${arg0}Obj->setEmail('jhon@example.com');
	  
/* ----------- Read Value --------------- */
$fname =  ${arg0}Obj->getFirstName();
$fname =  ${arg0}Obj->getLastName();
$fname =  ${arg0}Obj->getEmail();
